lender.name: Roger & Dianne
lender.loan_because: We want to assist people in a way that allows them to support themselves and their families, and at the same time increases their self reliance and dignity.

lender.name: Veronika
lender.loan_because: I am able to.

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: This is the right thing to do.

lender.name: Glenn
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a hand up. Loaning to people who are eager to make a difference in their own lives gives them more control of their own futures.

lender.name: Helen
lender.loan_because: I can and therefore I should! Also, Kiva is an instant way to buy meaningful gifts without having to leave the house.. Few clicks of a mouse and you've changed lives forever and for the better!
lender.occupational_info: I buy and sell secondhand /retro /fashion/ jewellery goods. My shop is called Fat Helen's and I specialise in not specialising - if an item is saleable, profitable and ethical, I'll sell it. I turned my hobby into a job and therefore I love every minute of my work.... Also, my job allows me to travel and work with dogs like Bernard (pictured) in Bangkok as I buy stock for my shop.

lender.name: Bernadette
lender.loan_because: I'm not sure if I will loan again, for the same reason that Judy withdrew her funds: http://www.kiva.org/lender/judith5298 "I am withdrawing my funds from Kiva ... and making future loans through other organizations because Kiva continues to promote cockfighting businesses by posting cockfighting loans on the Kiva website. ..... For over a year Kiva has been requested by many, many Kiva lenders to please add bloodsports to the list of businesses for which Kiva will not post loans, but kiva management adamantly refuses. Therefore I am withdrawing my funds and am supporting other more humane organizations."

lender.name: Madame Magpie
lender.loan_because: I want to help others realize their goals and independence.
lender.occupational_info: I fabricate silver jewelry.

lender.name: Nick and Mara
lender.occupational_info: mostly walking

lender.name: Robyn
lender.loan_because: I am just so glad that fate or whatever made me an Australian ( the lucky country ) & I feel for all those people who aren't so lucky & life is so hard for them.
lender.occupational_info: I volunteer for three different entities.

lender.name: Leake Family
lender.loan_because: Its a fantastic concept and we love the idea of helping people help themselves.

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: Every one deserves a helping hand. Not a hand out.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: This is one of the best ways I find, to make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I relive my childhood at through Kiva by visiting roadside grocers in wooden sheds with old wooden window frames and wire meshes, roadeside stands that sell fish and all, and a human face (and maybe a cute child) that says "I've had a hard but decent life."

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: I can and all those who can, should.

lender.name: Ross
lender.loan_because: Karma is a bitch
lender.occupational_info: Gifted

lender.name: Christmas Clan
lender.loan_because: It's a way for our extended family to share the spirit of Christmas together. Every year as a group we'll pick some entrepreneurs to support.

lender.name: Simon & Ysolde
lender.loan_because: We want communities to have an opportunity to look after themselves
lender.occupational_info: We both enjoy teaching people.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference and help others working hard that need a helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: I make software for people that impacts the lives of the world around us every day...

lender.name: Vannak
lender.loan_because:
because I used to be in their shoes!
We are extremely fortunate to have what we have and the poor should benefit from us.

lender.name: Jordan
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. I would want people to lend to me if I were in need. We can not always choose the conditions we find ourselves in but we can certainly try and make them better for ourselves and others while we are alive.
lender.occupational_info: I use computer software for spatial analysis and planning. I'm also a evening law student.

lender.name: Pria
lender.loan_because: instead of giving Christmas gifts, my family have agreed to each make a donation to a charity. I have become a Kiva lender on behalf of my family.

lender.name: Sion
lender.loan_because: I want money to go directly to the people who need it.
lender.occupational_info: I create websites and children's artwork.

lender.name: Ramzis
lender.loan_because: too buy instruments

lender.name: John Malino
lender.loan_because: I saw the ad with Bill Clinton, checked it out, and think this is a great organisation.
lender.occupational_info: Mostly playing corporate parties, weddings etc.

lender.name: Magdalena
lender.loan_because: I'm happy I can help

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: Kiva is such a clever cool idea. Assuming most loans are repaid then you can just go on lending and lending to more people that need a little help.I am living in Cambodia right now and I can see all too clearly what a difference Kiva and all the lenders can make. I will be leaving to go back to the UK soon and wanted to become a part of this.Hopefully I can persuade a few more people to come on board !
lender.occupational_info: I came to Cambodia in July 2008 to teach as a volunteer and then later as a paid teacher..but it's the voluntary work that interests me the most and once I am back in the UK would like to think I can raise the profile of Cambodia and all its challenges that the people here face.

lender.name: Tanara
lender.loan_because: it feels right.
lender.occupational_info: I use Traditional Chinese and Japanese medicine to help bring people to happy and healthy body harmony.

lender.name: Axel
lender.loan_because: this program is incredibly good.

lender.name: Aly
lender.loan_because: the best ideas require collaborations
lender.occupational_info: I invent bicycling and camping products

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: I acquired these loans as Christmas gifts for my daughters. Women helping women.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Technology Teacher. I am teaching my students about computers and how we can make a difference in the world.

lender.name: Barkman family
lender.loan_because: Foremost of course so that our money can help others. But it's also a way to learn more about the life in other parts of the world, it's a glimpse of how live could have been if we weren't so lucky as to have been born in Sweden. We also hope that this is something that can help our children to realize how fortunate the are and teach them good values.
lender.occupational_info: We are two working adults, a boy that's 1.5 yrs old and another child on the way.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can, because I want to, because it is right.

lender.name: Gustavo
lender.loan_because: I believe in a better world, where everyone help each other.

lender.name: Elaine
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do! I see so much of the world and how much so many in the world need help.
lender.occupational_info: I work on cruise ships and sell future cruises to current cruisers.

lender.name: Julian
lender.occupation: student at Missoula International School (first gr
lender.loan_because: I want to help people have a happy life.
lender.occupational_info: I'm in first grade at the Missoula International School.

lender.name: dedi
lender.loan_because: I want to increase the amount of mushroom bag log from 5,000 pcs to 10,000 pcs so production of my mushroom plantations from 15 kgs become 30 kgs per day. It's very hard to lend the cafital in my area. I am broke now because more than 12 years I lost my work because economic crisis in my country
lender.occupational_info: I bought bag logs of mush room from producer, I grew it up in a special room around 30 days, than It was pick up for 4 - 5 times harvesting within 4 mounths each bag log. I sold the mush room back to producer as a colector then sold to local market.

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: We should all help each other. The world becomes a better place, one small step at a time.

lender.name: dino & lara
lender.loan_because:
we loan bacause we are very luky guys and we desire to help people with less opportunity, we know kiva today from "Alle falde del kilimangiaro RAI3" and we hope to help more the next days!
From Cortina with love!

lender.name: ^ Degani ^
lender.loan_because: Siamo venuti per allontanare sofferenza, miseria, isolamento, vi in noi la preoccupazione costante di non voltare il viso alla prova, questo desiderio intenso di diffondere il bene e questo slancio di umanit,questa la nostra ragione d'essere

lender.name: Sheila
lender.loan_because: A little help from us can help get people, who have barely nothing, through life with a minimum of dignity.....

lender.name: Design with Purpose
lender.loan_because: I believe giving a chance to these women entrepreneurs will help their families and communities break the chain of poverty and hopefully inspire them to help others in need.
lender.occupational_info: Our mission is to create positive change through meaningful design. To help companies grow by, not only delivering results, but, as a by-product, having a positive impact on society as a whole.

lender.name: Bill and Donna
lender.loan_because: We love being able to help people achieve their dreams and we think the multiplier effect created by the repayment of loans is incredibly powerful.
lender.occupational_info: We own a vineyard, grow grapes, and make wine.

lender.name: Judianne & Ralph
lender.loan_because: We want everyone to be able to take care of their loved ones.
lender.occupational_info: We both work office jobs for a bank.

lender.name: Marti
lender.loan_because: I believe that lending a hand up is the right thing to do

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I like to help others
lender.occupational_info: something technical with websites

lender.name: Lorena
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people that can help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I work as a secretary in a children hospital in Rome, Italy. There are plenty of opportunities to be friendly and helpful to others.

lender.name: Werner
lender.loan_because: I think it's a way to give people an opportunity to expand their business.
lender.occupational_info: We help people who are unemployed to find a new job, we help starting entrepreneurs to start up their business, we run a business incubator and we supply staff training.

lender.name: emilio
lender.loan_because: i think it's a good way to help people
lender.occupational_info: I'm a forester. I'm working to saveguard the enviroment

lender.name: Vanessa
lender.loan_because: It makes everything just a bit clearer in terms of what is important in life.
lender.occupational_info: I work in Fashion/Internet

lender.name: Bjrn & Elisabeth
lender.loan_because: We want to make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: Bjrn is a lawyer and Elisabeth is a psychologist

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I want to give others the same opportunites that I have.
lender.occupational_info: study, study, study, study.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I feel privileged to have been born in the time, place and situation I was, and would like to use this privilege to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I send American university students to study at universities in other countries for a short period of time so that they can learn about other cultures and broaden their experiences.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office at the fire department

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I'm lucky
lender.occupational_info: Businessman

lender.name: Caleb AP
lender.loan_because: What little I have, others can use.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I want to connect to others throughout the world through entrepreneurial work

lender.name: Tuomas Talola
lender.loan_because: I want to enable people to help themselves and build better future for their families.
lender.occupational_info: My great goal is to bring more equality into lending and finance.

lender.name: Stephen and Kelsey
lender.loan_because: "Give until it hurts, and count it a privilege. There will never be a day when we regret an act of generosity or kindness." --Scott Todd, Compassion International

lender.name: Amy and Catherine
lender.loan_because: In memory of our Nanna.

lender.name: Jeffrey
lender.loan_because: it's something I can do to help.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: Everybody needs a little help sometimes. Kiva helps connect us with the world and is very energizing!

lender.name: Don Manolo
lender.loan_because: I believe that no effort is too small. I believe that everyone is created equal. I believe in spreading kindness. I believe all of us.

lender.name: Joo
lender.occupational_info: i'm a researcher on feminist studies and gender studies.

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because:
This was a gift to me and the message that there are many people more needing of this gift than myself.
It feels wonderful to help and be able to continue to give!

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because: It's a terrific way of helping people to become self sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: Manufacturing and Supply Chain management.

lender.name: Nylene
lender.loan_because: Nylene Mayer was a beloved mother, wife, sister, friend, aunt , philanthropist and overall inspiration. She passed away December 3, 2009, at the age of 72. In her honor and with the help of generous colleagues, her daughter Laura, a Kiva fanatic, has opened this account and will maintain her mother's loans in perpetuity. In this way, Nylene's legacy can continue through the miracle of microlending!

lender.name: Massimo
lender.loan_because: I belive in people
lender.occupational_info: Well, I work in the countryside, I'm a plant producer.. I love nature

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I want to give poeple there dreams
lender.occupational_info: I run a restaurant.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I want everyone dreams to come true
lender.occupational_info: I work in a hotel, and i try to put a smile on everyone face

lender.name: Extended Ldin Gang
lender.loan_because: We would like to support entrepreneurs lacking nothing but the initial capital to use their talents, implement their plan and, who knows, build their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: some of us work in medecine/nursing, some in the chemical sectors, others contribute to fighting climate change.. and yet others are clearly too young to even care about that thing called work. :)

lender.name: Katarina
lender.loan_because: I like to help.

lender.name: Boba Fett
lender.loan_because: I like to see results.

lender.name: Stefan
lender.loan_because: I mean it
lender.occupational_info: I find new business and create new products/services for my employer

lender.name: Debby
lender.loan_because: "Speak up for those who cannot speak for themselves, for the rights of all who are destitute. Speak up and judge fairly; defend the rights of the poor and needy." -Proverbs 31:8-9
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at Wheaton College. I am currently studying Biblical Archaeology and English Literature.

lender.name: Silvio
lender.loan_because: because I hope that thanks to the help of all the world can be improved and to give a smile to whom really it needs it.

lender.name: Vytautas
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of entrepreneurship

lender.name: Leisha
lender.loan_because: Saint Kitte gave me $25 to get me started.
lender.occupational_info: I do whatever my bosses tell me.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: it makes a difference.

lender.name: Jenny
lender.loan_because: I hope this will be of some help

lender.name: Melanie & Peter
lender.loan_because: it is the best use of what money we have.

lender.name: Molly and Pete
lender.occupational_info: Molly and Pete both work for an online fashion retailer

lender.name: Monica & Family
lender.loan_because: I want to help people get themselves out of poverty, primarily in Guatemala where I built homes for the work poor and where I shown how God works in the World.
lender.occupational_info: Interactive Project Manager

lender.name: Erik Svensson
lender.loan_because: I want to make people succesfull

lender.name: Chad
lender.loan_because: I believe something about teaching to fish and giving away fish and a man and whatnot.
lender.occupational_info: I sit at a desk for most of my day, feeling soft and spoiled.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: Its a chance to be a part of growing a small business for deserving business owners.
lender.occupational_info: Providing electrical components for industrial machines in manufacturing.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I believe in entreprenuership and providing opportunities for anyone who wants to work hard.
lender.occupational_info: My work is to ensure services to children with disabilities. They, too, deserve an opportunity to be all that they can be!

lender.name: Claire
lender.loan_because: I like to help people

lender.name: RaeDeen
lender.loan_because: I believe it is important to "help others."
lender.occupational_info: Speaking and writing words to inspire

lender.name: Overclock.net
lender.loan_because: Overclockers care.
lender.occupational_info: We love technology.

lender.name: Collette
lender.loan_because: I hope to empower men & women around the world to follow their dreams and give them the encouragement, tools, help, and resources that they need to be able to support their families and friends.
lender.occupational_info: I perform On Broadway and help people to relax, sing, dance, laugh and smile for 2.5 hours roughly 8x's a week. I also work to be an active socially responsible citizen not only in the USA, but in the world too.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I believe anyone with a dream should have an opportunity to reach it.
lender.occupational_info: I worked hard, saved my money and now I live in Mexico in a little village. I have a small amount of money I can loan to people who have a good idea, will work hard.

lender.name: Yuli
lender.loan_because: I am a single parent with 1 kid. I lost my job on September 2009 and now run an online store (www.belanja-yuk.com) and selling at bazars. I want to build a real store and rent a shop, but I can not afford it because the cost is too high, all the shop owners want 1 year advance payment.
lender.occupational_info: I sell bags and woman&kid apparels, online (www.belanja-yuk.com) and selling them at bazars. My gross profit is around 40% and so far i have earn some money from the activities. I want to open a bag shop and expanding the business.

lender.name: Thomas & Carol
lender.loan_because: We are blessed.

lender.name: Layla
lender.loan_because: It's helping others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work towards supporting councils and communities reducing waste to landfill

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: despite being a student with not much time or money, Kiva provides a great way of making the littlest donations matter.

lender.name: Claudia
lender.loan_because: A small contribution can create a big positive impact in someones life.

lender.name: kumar
lender.loan_because: A friend in need is a friend indeed.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I'm selfish! I like the warm-and-fuzzy feeling it gives me.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: It is better than giving money to charity. This way it creates wealth in both financial and mental abilities.

lender.name: Ariana
lender.loan_because: I received my loan credit through a gift exchange, not having known about Kiva before. Now, I take huge pleasure in scrolling through the Kiva profiles finding interesting people. I hope to make many more loans and change many more lives!

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I believe entrepreneurship is the key to economic development, and that economic success around the world is good for everyone.
